verses.roman:
tabe mahāprabhu kṣaṇeka mauna kari' rahe
mane eka kari' punaḥ sanātane kahe

synonyms: tabe—thereupon; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kṣaṇeka—for a moment; mauna—silence; kari'-making; rahe—remained; mane—within His mind; eka kari'-adjusting things; punaḥ—again; sanātane—unto Sanātana Gosvāmī; kahe—instructs.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu then remained silent for a moment. Finally, adjusting things within His mind, He again spoke to Sanātana Gosvāmī.
